casebody.data:
City of Stamford v. Elaine Kakaletris et al. (14015)

Dupont, C. J., and Foti and Spear, Js.

Argued May 30 decision released June 27, 1995 *914Andrew P. Nemiroff, with whom, on the brief, was Carolyn Alexander Collins, for the appellant (defendant Giannoula Vasilakos). James V. Minor, assistant corporation counsel, with whom, on the brief, was Stephen McLaughlin, for the appellee (plaintiff). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
